verses.text: \w Then|strong="H1696"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w summoned|strong="H7121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w them|strong="H6213"\w*:\f + \fr 5:1 \ft Note that Deuteronomy 5:1 through Deuteronomy 26:19 may be presented as a continuous section of unbroken speech by Moses. In place of multiple levels of nested quotes, this section has been set apart with a double space.\f* \w Hear|strong="H8085"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w statutes|strong="H2706"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w ordinances|strong="H4941"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w declare|strong="H1696"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w hearing|strong="H8085"\w* \w this|strong="H6213"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*. \w Learn|strong="H3925"\w* \w them|strong="H6213"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w observe|strong="H8104"\w* \w them|strong="H6213"\w* \w carefully|strong="H6213"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H3772"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* us \w at|strong="H3068"\w* \w Horeb|strong="H2722"\w*.\f + \fr 5:2 \ft That is, Mount Sinai, or possibly a mountain in the range containing Mount Sinai\f*

\w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w did|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w make|strong="H3772"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* fathers, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w us|strong="H3588"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w alive|strong="H2416"\w* \w here|strong="H6311"\w* \w today|strong="H3117"\w*.

\w The|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w out|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* fire \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w*. The Ten Commandments (Exodus 20:1–17)

\w At|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w time|strong="H6256"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w standing|strong="H5975"\w* between \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w declare|strong="H5046"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w were|strong="H1697"\w* \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* fire \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w would|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w go|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w*. \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w said|strong="H1697"\w*:

“\w I|strong="H4714"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w brought|strong="H3318"\w* \w you|strong="H4714"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* land \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w slavery|strong="H5650"\w*.
You shall have no other gods before Me.\f + \fr 5:7 \ft Or besides Me\f*
You shall not make for yourself an idol in the form of anything in the heavens above, on the earth below, or in the waters beneath.

You shall not bow down to them or worship them; for I, the LORD your God, am a jealous God, visiting the iniquity of the fathers on their children to the third and fourth generations of those who hate Me,

but showing loving devotion to a thousand generations \f + \fr 5:10 \ft Hebrew loving devotion to thousands; forms of the Hebrew chesed are translated here and in most cases throughout the Scriptures as loving devotion; the range of meaning includes love, goodness, kindness, faithfulness, and mercy, as well as loyalty to a covenant.\f* of those who love Me and keep My commandments.
You shall not take the name of the LORD your God in vain, for the LORD will not leave anyone unpunished who takes His name in vain.
Observe the Sabbath day by keeping it holy, as the LORD your God has commanded you.
Six days you shall labor and do all your work,

but the seventh day is a Sabbath to the LORD your God, on which you must not do any work—neither you, nor your son or daughter, nor your manservant or maidservant, nor your ox or donkey or any of your livestock, nor the foreigner within your gates, so that your manservant and maidservant may rest as you do.

Remember that you were a slave in the land of Egypt, and that the LORD your God brought you out of there with a mighty hand and an outstretched arm. That is why the LORD your God has commanded you to keep the Sabbath day.

Honor your father and your mother, as the LORD your God has commanded you, so that your days may be long and that it may go well with you in the land that the LORD your God is giving you.\f + \fr 5:16 \ft Cited in Matthew 15:4, Matthew 19:19, Mark 7:10, Luke 18:20, and Ephesians 6:2–3\f*
You shall not murder.\f + \fr 5:17 \ft Cited in Matthew 5:21, Matthew 19:18, Mark 10:19, Luke 18:20, Romans 13:9, and James 2:11\f*
You shall not commit adultery.\f + \fr 5:18 \ft Cited in Matthew 5:27, Matthew 19:18, Mark 10:19, Luke 18:20, Romans 13:9, and James 2:11\f*
You shall not steal.\f + \fr 5:19 \ft Cited in Matthew 19:18, Mark 10:19, Luke 18:20, and Romans 13:9\f*
You shall not bear false witness against your neighbor.\f + \fr 5:20 \ft Cited in Matthew 19:18, Mark 10:19, and Luke 18:20\f*

You shall not covet \f + \fr 5:21 \ft Cited in Romans 7:7 and Romans 13:9\f* your neighbor’s wife. You shall not covet your neighbor’s house or field, or his manservant or maidservant, or his ox or donkey, or anything that belongs to your neighbor.” Moses Intercedes for the People (Exodus 20:18–21; Hebrews 12:18–29)

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w these|strong="H1696"\w* \w commandments|strong="H1697"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w loud|strong="H1419"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* \w assembly|strong="H6951"\w* \w out|strong="H5414"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* fire, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w deep|strong="H1419"\w* \w darkness|strong="H6205"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w*; \w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w added|strong="H3254"\w* \w nothing|strong="H3808"\w* \w more|strong="H3254"\w*. \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w wrote|strong="H3789"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w tablets|strong="H3871"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* stone \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w*.

\w And|strong="H6963"\w* \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w out|strong="H8432"\w* \w of|strong="H7626"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w darkness|strong="H2822"\w* \w while|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* blazing \w with|strong="H1197"\w* fire, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w heads|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H7626"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w* \w and|strong="H6963"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* \w approached|strong="H7126"\w* \w me|strong="H6963"\w*,

\w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w*, “\w Behold|strong="H2005"\w*, \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w shown|strong="H7200"\w* \w us|strong="H7200"\w* \w His|strong="H3068"\w* \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w greatness|strong="H1433"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w His|strong="H3068"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w out|strong="H7200"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* fire. \w Today|strong="H3117"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H2088"\w* \w can|strong="H7200"\w* \w live|strong="H2425"\w* \w even|strong="H3588"\w* \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w speaks|strong="H1696"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H7200"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w*, \w why|strong="H4100"\w* \w should|strong="H3068"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*? \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* fire \w will|strong="H3068"\w* consume \w us|strong="H3588"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*, \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w any|strong="H5750"\w* \w longer|strong="H5750"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w who|strong="H4310"\w* \w of|strong="H6963"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* \w has|strong="H4310"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w of|strong="H6963"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w living|strong="H2416"\w* \w God|strong="H4310"\w* \w speaking|strong="H1696"\w* \w out|strong="H8432"\w* \w of|strong="H6963"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* fire, \w as|strong="H3644"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3605"\w*, \w and|strong="H6963"\w* \w survived|strong="H2421"\w*?

\w Go|strong="H7126"\w* \w near|strong="H7126"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w listen|strong="H8085"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w says|strong="H1696"\w*. \w Then|strong="H1696"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w can|strong="H6213"\w* \w tell|strong="H1696"\w* \w us|strong="H6213"\w* \w everything|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w tells|strong="H1696"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w*; \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w listen|strong="H8085"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w obey|strong="H8085"\w*.”

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w me|strong="H6963"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w me|strong="H6963"\w*, “\w I|strong="H1697"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w that|strong="H5971"\w* \w these|strong="H2088"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w*. \w They|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w done|strong="H3190"\w* \w well|strong="H3190"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H5971"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w*.

\w If|strong="H1961"\w* \w only|strong="H3605"\w* \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w such|strong="H2088"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* \w Me|strong="H5414"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w My|strong="H8104"\w* \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w* \w always|strong="H3605"\w*, \w so|strong="H4616"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w might|strong="H4616"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w well|strong="H3190"\w* \w with|strong="H3117"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w with|strong="H3117"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w forever|strong="H5769"\w*.
\w Go|strong="H3212"\w* \w and|strong="H7725"\w* tell \w them|strong="H7725"\w*: ‘\w Return|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w your|strong="H7725"\w* tents.’

\w But|strong="H1696"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* \w here|strong="H6311"\w* \w with|strong="H6213"\w* \w Me|strong="H5414"\w*, \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w may|strong="H6213"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w* \w and|strong="H4941"\w* \w statutes|strong="H2706"\w* \w and|strong="H4941"\w* \w ordinances|strong="H4941"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w are|strong="H4687"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w teach|strong="H3925"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w follow|strong="H6213"\w* \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* land \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* am \w giving|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w possess|strong="H3423"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H6213"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w careful|strong="H8104"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w as|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w you|strong="H6680"\w*; \w you|strong="H6680"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w turn|strong="H5493"\w* \w aside|strong="H5493"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w right|strong="H3225"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w left|strong="H8040"\w*.

\w You|strong="H6680"\w* must \w walk|strong="H3212"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w ways|strong="H1870"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w you|strong="H6680"\w*, \w so|strong="H4616"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w you|strong="H6680"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w live|strong="H2421"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* prosper \w and|strong="H3068"\w* prolong \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* land \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w you|strong="H6680"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w possess|strong="H3423"\w*.
